name: Wizard's watch
description:
You are a wizard and your village is under attack. Push back the enemy forces with powerful spells.
Burn, freeze, shatter and crush the enemy soldiers with your spells.
Defend successfully the different parts of the village (the lumbermill, the farm, the town and the magic ruins) and defeat the evil boss to claim your victory.
  • Gain XP as you kill your enemies and unlock upgrades for your magic powers.
  • Unlock new wizard skins as you progress in the game and defeat your enemies with more power.
  • Defend your village with the help of one of your friends in the multiplayer co-op mode!
